docs.title: What is this guide?
docs.text:
My collection of best practices

FooService
public class FooService {

    public void doFoo() {
        foo.doSomething();
    }

}

theme:
  features:
    - content.code.annotate # (1)
  1. I'm a code annotation! I can contain code, formatted text, images, ... basically anything that can be written in Markdown.
Danger

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nulla et euismod nulla. Curabitur feugiat, tortor non consequat finibus, justo purus auctor massa, nec semper lorem quam in massa.

sequenceDiagram
  autonumber
  Alice->>John: Hello John, how are you?
  loop Healthcheck
      John->>John: Fight against hypochondria
  end
  Note right of John: Rational thoughts!
  John-->>Alice: Great!
  John->>Bob: How about you?
  Bob-->>John: Jolly good!

Using state diagrams

stateDiagram-v2
  state fork_state <<fork>>
    [*] --> fork_state
    fork_state --> State2
    fork_state --> State3

    state join_state <<join>>
    State2 --> join_state
    State3 --> join_state
    join_state --> State4
    State4 --> [*]

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: Welcome to the Amazon AWS Best Practices Guide. The purpose of this guide is to provide prescriptive guidance for leveraging Amazon IAM policy hardening.

docs.title: How to use this guide
docs.text:
The topics do not need to be read in a particular order:

  • IAM-Policy
  • Getting started
    • Condition
    • Tag
